div.p: For rectal resections this field indicates the intactness of the mesorectum.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
CodeDisplay
408659008Intactness of mesorectal specimen incomplete
408658000Mesorectal specimen nearly completely intact
408657005Mesorectal specimen completely intact

description.value: For rectal resections this field indicates the intactness of the mesorectum.
